  1: <?php
  2: /**
  3:  * Ce fichier est développé pour la gestion de la librairie Mélanie2
  4:  * Cette Librairie permet d'accèder aux données sans avoir à implémenter de couche SQL
  5:  * Des objets génériques vont permettre d'accèder et de mettre à jour les données
  6:  *
  7:  * ORM M2 Copyright © 2017  PNE Annuaire et Messagerie/MEDDE
  8:  *
  9:  * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
 10:  * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
 11:  * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 12:  * (at your option) any later version.
 13:  *
 14:  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
 15:  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 16:  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
 17:  * GNU General Public License for more details.
 18:  *
 19:  * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 20:  * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
 21:  */
 22: namespace LibMelanie\Lib;
 23: 
 24: use LibMelanie\Config\ConfigMelanie;
 25: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\User;
 26: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\Task;
 27: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\Taskslist;
 28: use LibMelanie\Log\M2Log;
 29: 
 30: // Utilisation de la librairie Sabre VObject pour la conversion ICS
 31: @include_once 'vendor/autoload.php';
 32: use Sabre\VObject;
 33: 
 34: /**
 35:  * Class de génération de l'ICS en fonction de l'objet évènement
 36:  * Méthodes Statiques
 37:  *
 38:  * @author PNE Messagerie/Apitech
 39:  * @package Librairie Mélanie2
 40:  * @subpackage Lib Mélanie2
 41:  *
 42:  */
 43: class TaskToICS {
 44:     /**
 45:      * Identifiant de l'outil utilisant l'ICS (pour la génération)
 46:      * @var string
 47:      */
 48:     const PRODID = '-//ORM LibMelanie2 PHP/PNE Messagerie/MEDDE';
 49:     /**
 50:      * Version ICalendar utilisé pour la génération de l'ICS
 51:      * @var string
 52:      */
 53:     const VERSION = '2.0';
 54: 
 55:     /**
 56:      * Variable configurable depuis l'extérieur pour définir
 57:      * si les pièces jointes sont proposées via une URL
 58:      * ou directement en binaire (encodage base64)
 59:      * @var bool
 60:      */
 61:     public static $USE_ATTACH_URL = true;
 62: 
 63: 
 64:     /**
 65:      *  Constructeur privé pour ne pas instancier la classe
 66:      */
 67:     private function __construct() { }
 68: 
 69:     /**
 70:      * Génére un ICS en fonction de la tâche passée en paramètre
 71:      * La tâche doit être de type Task de la librairie LibM2
 72:      * @param Task $task
 73:      * @param Taskslist $taskslist
 74:      * @param User $user
 75:      * @return string $ics
 76:      */
 77:     public static function Convert(Task $task, Taskslist $taskslist = null, User $user = null) {
 78:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, "TaskToICS->Convert()");
 79:         $vcalendar = new VObject\Component\VCalendar();
 80:         $vtodo = $vcalendar->add('VTODO');
 81:         // PRODID et Version
 82:         $vcalendar->PRODID = self::PRODID;
 83:         $vcalendar->VERSION = self::VERSION;
 84:         // Gestion du timezone
 85:       if (isset($user)) {
 86:           $timezone = $user->getTimezone();
 87:         }
 88:       elseif (isset($taskslist)) {
 89:             $timezone = $taskslist->getTimezone();
 90:         }
 91:         if (empty($timezone)) {
 92:           $timezone = ConfigMelanie::CALENDAR_DEFAULT_TIMEZONE;
 93:         }
 94:         // UID
 95:         $vtodo->UID = $task->uid;
 96:         // Génération de l'objet vtodo
 97:         $vtodo = self::getVtodoFromTask($vtodo, $task, $taskslist, $user);
 98:         return $vcalendar->serialize();
 99:     }
100: 
101:     /**
102:      * Méthode permettant de générer l'objet VTODO à partir des données de l'évènement
103:      * Cette méthode est séparée pour être appelé plusieurs fois, dans le cas où l'évènement a des exceptions
104:      * @param VObject\Component $vtodo
105:      * @param Task $task
106:      * @param Taskslist $taskslist
107:      * @param User $user
108:      * @return VTodo
109:      */
110:     private static function getVtodoFromTask(VObject\Component $vtodo, Task $task, Taskslist $taskslist = null, User $user = null) {
111:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, "TaskToICS->getVtodoFromTask()");
112:       // Timezone
113:         if (isset($user)) {
114:           $timezone = $user->getTimezone();
115:         }
116:       elseif (isset($taskslist)) {
117:             $timezone = $taskslist->getTimezone();
118:         }
119:         if (empty($timezone)) {
120:           $timezone = ConfigMelanie::CALENDAR_DEFAULT_TIMEZONE;
121:         }
122:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, "TaskToICS->getVtodoFromTask() timezone : " . $timezone);
123:         // Class
124:         if (isset($task->class)) {
125:             switch ($task->class) {
126:                 case Task::CLASS_CONFIDENTIAL:
127:                     $vtodo->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_CONFIDENTIAL;
128:                     break;
129:                 case Task::CLASS_PRIVATE:
130:                     $vtodo->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_PRIVATE;
131:                     break;
132:                 case Task::CLASS_PUBLIC:
133:                 default:
134:                   $vtodo->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_PUBLIC;
135:                   break;
136:             }
137:         } else $vtodo->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_PUBLIC;
138: 
139:         // Status
140:         if (isset($task->status)) {
141:           switch ($task->status) {
142:           case Task::STATUS_CANCELLED:
143:             $vtodo->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_CANCELLED;
144:             break;
145:           case Task::STATUS_COMPLETED:
146:             $vtodo->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_COMPLETED;
147:             break;
148:           case Task::STATUS_IN_PROCESS:
149:             $vtodo->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_IN_PROCESS;
150:             break;
151:           default:
152:           case Task::STATUS_NEEDS_ACTION:
153:             $vtodo->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_NEEDS_ACTION;
154:             break;
155:           }
156:         } else $vtodo->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_NEEDS_ACTION;
157: 
158:         // DTSTAMP
159:         if (isset($task->modified)) {
160:           $dateTime = new \DateTime('@'.$task->modified, new \DateTimeZone($timezone));
161:           $dateTime->setTimezone(new \DateTimeZone('UTC'));
162:           $date = $dateTime->format('Ymd\THis\Z');
163:           $vtodo->add(ICS::DTSTAMP, $date);
164:           $vtodo->add(ICS::LAST_MODIFIED, $date);
165:           $vtodo->add(ICS::CREATED, $date);
166:         }
167: 
168:         // DTSTART
169:         if (isset($task->start)) {
170:           $dateTime = new \DateTime('@'.$task->start, new \DateTimeZone($timezone));
171:           $vtodo->add(ICS::DTSTART, $dateTime->format('Ymd\THis\Z'));
172:         }
173:         // DUE
174:         if (isset($task->due)) {
175:           $dateTime = new \DateTime('@'.$task->due, new \DateTimeZone($timezone));
176:           $vtodo->add(ICS::DUE, $dateTime->format('Ymd\THis\Z'));
177:         }
178:         // COMPLETED
179:         if (isset($task->completed_date)) {
180:           $dateTime = new \DateTime('@'.$task->completed_date, new \DateTimeZone($timezone));
181:           $vtodo->add(ICS::COMPLETED, $dateTime->format('Ymd\THis\Z'));
182:         }
183: 
184:         if (($task->class == Task::CLASS_PRIVATE
185:                 || $task->class == Task::CLASS_CONFIDENTIAL)
186:                 && $task->owner != $user->uid
187:                 && isset($taskslist)
188:                 && $taskslist->owner !=  $user->uid
189:             && !$taskslist->asRight(\LibMelanie\Config\ConfigMelanie::PRIV)) {
190:             $vtodo->SUMMARY = 'Événement privé';
191:         } else {
192:             // Titre
193:             if (isset($task->name) && $task->name != "") $vtodo->SUMMARY = $task->name;
194:             // Catégories
195:             if (isset($task->category) && $task->category != "") {
196:               $categories = explode(',', $task->category);
197:               foreach ($categories as $category) {
198:                 $vtodo->add(ICS::CATEGORIES, $category);
199:               }
200:             }
201:             // Description
202:             if (isset($task->description) && $task->description != "") $vtodo->DESCRIPTION = $task->description;
203:             // Percent complete
204:             if (isset($task->percent_complete)) $vtodo->add(ICS::PERCENT_COMPLETE, $task->percent_complete);
205:       // Priority
206:       if (isset($task->priority)) {
207:         switch ($task->priority) {
208:           case Task::PRIORITY_VERY_HIGH:
209:             $vtodo->PRIORITY = 1;
210:             break;
211:           case Task::PRIORITY_HIGH:
212:             $vtodo->PRIORITY = 3;
213:             break;
214:           case Task::PRIORITY_NORMAL;
215:             $vtodo->PRIORITY = 5;
216:             break;
217:           case Task::PRIORITY_LOW;
218:             $vtodo->PRIORITY = 7;
219:             break;
220:           case Task::PRIORITY_VERY_LOW;
221:             $vtodo->PRIORITY = 9;
222:             break;
223:           default:
224:             $vtodo->PRIORITY = 0;
225:             break;
226:         }
227:       }
228:       // Parent
229:       if (isset($task->parent)) {
230:         $vtodo->{ICS::RELATED_TO} = $task->parent;
231:       }
232:             // Alarm
233:             if (isset($task->alarm) && $task->alarm != 0) {
234:                 $valarm = $vtodo->add('VALARM');
235:                 $valarm->TRIGGER = self::formatAlarm($task->alarm);
236:                 $valarm->TRIGGER[ICS::VALUE] = ICS::VALUE_DURATION;
237:                 $valarm->ACTION = ICS::ACTION_DISPLAY;
238:                 // Attributs sur l'alarme
239:                 $x_moz_lastack = $task->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_LASTACK);
240:                 if (isset($x_moz_lastack)) $vtodo->{ICS::X_MOZ_LASTACK} = $x_moz_lastack;
241:                 $x_moz_snooze_time = $task->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_SNOOZE_TIME);
242:                 if (isset($x_moz_snooze_time)) $vtodo->{ICS::X_MOZ_SNOOZE_TIME} = $x_moz_snooze_time;
243:             }
244:             // Taskslist infos
245:             if (isset($taskslist)) {
246:               $vtodo->add(ICS::X_CALDAV_CALENDAR_ID, $taskslist->id);
247:               $vtodo->add(ICS::X_CALDAV_CALENDAR_OWNER, $taskslist->owner);
248:             }
249:             // Sequence
250:             $sequence = $task->getAttribute(ICS::SEQUENCE);
251:             if (isset($sequence)) $vtodo->SEQUENCE = $sequence;
252:             // X Moz Generation
253:             $moz_generation = $task->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_GENERATION);
254:             if (isset($moz_generation)) $vtodo->add(ICS::X_MOZ_GENERATION, $moz_generation);
255:         }
256:         return $vtodo;
257:     }
258:     
259:     /**
260:      * Formatte l'alarme en minutes en un trigger ICS
261:      * @param int $alarm En minutes
262:      * @return string
263:      */
264:     private static function formatAlarm($alarm) {
265:         if ($alarm < 0) {
266:             $trigger = "P";
267:             $alarm = - $alarm;
268:         }
269:         else {
270:             $trigger = "-P";
271:         }
272:         
273:         // Nombre de semaines, 10080 minutes
274:         if ($alarm >= 10080) {
275:             $nb_weeks = (int)($alarm / 10080);
276:             $alarm -= $nb_weeks * 10080;
277:             $trigger .= $nb_weeks."W";
278:         }
279:         // Nombre de jours, 1440 minutes
280:         if ($alarm >= 1440) {
281:             $nb_days = (int)($alarm / 1440);
282:             $alarm -= $nb_days * 1440;
283:             $trigger .= $nb_days."D";
284:         }
285:         if ($alarm > 0) {
286:             $trigger .= "T";
287:         }
288:         // Nombre d'heures, 60 minutes
289:         if ($alarm >= 60) {
290:             $nb_hours = (int)($alarm / 60);
291:             $alarm -= $nb_hours * 60;
292:             $trigger .= $nb_hours."H";
293:         }
294:         // Nombre de minutes
295:         if ($alarm > 0) {
296:             $trigger .= $alarm."M";
297:         }
298:         return $trigger;
299:     }
300: 
301:     /**
302:      * Ajoute le timezone au VCalendar
303:      * @param VObject\Component $vcalendar
304:      * @param string $timezone
305:      */
306:     private static function generationTimezone(VObject\Component $vcalendar, $timezone) {
307:         if (!ConfigMelanie::ICS_ADD_TIMEZONE) return;
308: 
309:         if ($timezone === 'Europe/Paris') {
310:             $vtimezone = $vcalendar->add('VTIMEZONE');
311:             $vtimezone->TZID = 'Europe/Paris';
312:             $vtimezone->add(ICS::X_LIC_LOCATION, 'Europe/Paris');
313:             $daylight = $vtimezone->add('DAYLIGHT');
314:             $daylight->TZOFFSETFROM = '+0100';
315:             $daylight->TZOFFSETTO = '+0200';
316:             $daylight->TZNAME = 'CEST';
317:             $daylight->DTSTART = '19700329T020000';
318:             $daylight->RRULE = 'FREQ=YEARLY;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=3';
319:             $standard = $vtimezone->add('STANDARD');
320:             $standard->TZOFFSETFROM = '+0200';
321:             $standard->TZOFFSETTO = '+0100';
322:             $standard->TZNAME = 'CET';
323:             $standard->DTSTART = '19701025T030000';
324:             $standard->RRULE = 'FREQ=YEARLY;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=10';
325:         }
326:     }
327: }
